text: Innum, ‘‘kiristavarkal e(nta markkat)tilumillai'' ena yutarkal kurukinranar. (Avvanra) ‘‘yutarkal e(nta markkat)tilumillai'' enak kiristavarkalum kurukinranar. Anal, ivviruvarume (tankalin kurrukku ataramaka paipilin ‘palaiya erpatakiya' tavrat ennum ore) vetattai(ttan) otukirarkal. Ivarkal kurikkolvatu polave (vetattai) ariyata (inaivaittu vanankupa)varkal (‘‘yutarkalum kiristavarkalum em'markkattaiyum cerntavarkal alla'' enak) kurukirarkal. Anal, ivarkal ceytu kontirukkum inta tarkkattaip parri marumaiyil allah ivarkalukkut tirppalippan
